type.en: Course with defence at the end

description.en: Acquiering the foundations of scientific research and carrying out the research. Scientific Research is carried out according to the individual plan of the studies. The performance of the plan is assessed at the end of every study year by attestation engagement and by the defence of doctoral thesis at the end of studies. Doctoral research is carried out under the supervision of superviser who is appointed by faculties council. The requirements to doctoral thesis are fixed by the Statutes of Academic Degrees in Tartu Universrity.
description.et: Teadustöö kõikide etappide teoreetiliste aluste omandamine ja teadustöö läbiviimine kõrgtasemel. Doktorandi teadustöö toimub individuaalplaani alusel, mille täitmist hinnatakse iga õppeaasta lõpul atesteerimise käigus ja doktoriõppe lõpul väitekirja kaitsmisel.

objectives.en: The aim of Scientific Research is to acquire the skills of scientific research. Doctoral thesis will be written as the result of the research. A Doctoral thesis is an independent study which presents an original argumentative solution to a specific scientific problem and the results of which have been sufficiently reflected in international professional literature.
objectives.et: Eesmärgiks on arendada uurimistöö kavandamise ja läbiviimise oskust ja tehnikaid erialavaldkonnas. Teadustöö tulemusena valmib iseseisev uurimus, milles on esitatud konkreetse teadusliku probleemi argumenteeritud originaalne lahendus ja mille tulemused on avaldatud nõutaval tasemel rahvusvahelises erialases kirjanduses ning rahvusvahelistel konverentsidel.

learning_outcomes.en:
After the completing scientific research, doctoral student will:
a) have contemporary and deep knowledge in his/her area of research,
b) be able to initiate. plan, carry out, and assess research and developmental work,
c) find and give a cause for research questions and formulate the questions,
d) master and develop the knowledge and research methods in his/her area of research,
e) be able to gather and analyse the research data,
f) be able to publish his/her research results in pre-reviewed research publications,
g) have the skills of management, team work, innovative thinking taking strategic decisions,
h) understand his/her responsibility for the effects of scientific research.
